leveled_achievements.title: Evil Survivor
leveled_achievements.info: Get this achievement by winning matches in "Infection Mode". Infection mode was introduced in August 2019, but was removed later on. Infection Mode became available again for a short period of time during a halloween special in 2020.

leveled_achievements.title: Victory Legion
leveled_achievements.description: Score the final kill {num_tasks} times in Team Deathmatch

leveled_achievements.title: A Step Too Far
leveled_achievements.description: Get chased by monsters for {num_tasks} in zombie mode

leveled_achievements.title: Ride It Out
leveled_achievements.description: Kill {num_tasks} zombies in Zombie: Survive Till Dawn

leveled_achievements.title: Predator
leveled_achievements.description: Kill {num_tasks} enemies in a single Classic match

leveled_achievements.title: Alive At Dawn
leveled_achievements.description: Win {num_tasks} times in Zombie: Darkest Night

leveled_achievements.title: Until Dawn
leveled_achievements.description: Win {num_tasks} in Zombie: Survive Till Dawn

leveled_achievements.title: Chicken Veteran
leveled_achievements.description: Earn {num_tasks} challenge coins from crew challenges

leveled_achievements.title: Going Commando
leveled_achievements.description: Win {num_tasks} Solo Classic matches while in Platinum tier or above, and not equipping any helments, vests or backpacks.

levels.num_tasks: Get a rating of A or above 3 times
Get a rating of S or above 5 times
Get a rating of SS or above 10 times
Get a rating of SSS or above 20 times
Get a rating of SSS or above 50 times

leveled_achievements.title: Perfectionist
leveled_achievements.description: Reach the highest Royal Pass rank for {num_tasks} seasons in a row

leveled_achievements.title: Dependable
leveled_achievements.description: Log in for a total of {num_tasks} days

levels.num_tasks: Upgrade a firearm finish to Rank 2
Upgrade a firearm finish to Rank 3

leveled_achievements.title: Bargainer
leveled_achievements.description: Bargain for a total of {num_tasks} UC for friends

leveled_achievements.title: Brother In Arms
leveled_achievements.description: Complete {num_tasks} matches while in a group with friends

leveled_achievements.title: Santa Claus
leveled_achievements.description: Gift an items to a friend {num_tasks} times

leveled_achievements.title: Jinxed (Legendary Items)
leveled_achievements.description: Failed to get items that are legendary or above {num_tasks} times in a row. Only applies to crates that cost 120UC or more.

leveled_achievements.title: Jinxed (Mythic Items)
leveled_achievements.description: Failed to get items that are mythic or above {num_tasks} times in a row. Only applies to crates that cost 120UC or more.

leveled_achievements.title: Elite Communicator
leveled_achievements.description: Sned {num_tasks} radio messages in the Chat Channel

leveled_achievements.title: Do-It-Yourselfer
leveled_achievements.description: Kill {num_tasks} enemies with a Guncraft Firearm

leveled_achievements.title: Anniversary Celebration
leveled_achievements.description: You have collected {num_tasks} login for the Anniversary Celebration! Anniversary Celebration: March 21 (UTC+0)

leveled_achievements.title: Critic
leveled_achievements.description: Rate the items in the gallery {num_tasks} times

leveled_achievements.title: Elite Clan
leveled_achievements.description: Complete the weekly personal energy objective in a clan for {num_tasks} weeks

leveled_achievements.title: Bullseye
leveled_achievements.description: Get more than 75 points {num_tasks} times at the Cheer Park shooting range

leveled_achievements.title: Hello World
leveled_achievements.description: Invite {num_tasks} different players in the Cheer Park you are in.

leveled_achievements.title: Panology Professor
leveled_achievements.description: Get {num_tasks} kills with a Pan in the Library map of Arena

leveled_achievements.title: Battlemania
leveled_achievements.description: Complete {num_tasks} matches in any mode with special characters
